#Load Packages
```{r, message=FALSE}
#install.packages("tidyverse")
library(tidyverse)
```

#Important Data
```{r, message=FALSE}
#I am going to import the data into R

iris_data <- read_csv("iris.csv")

```

#Summarize The Variables
```{r}
summary(iris_data)
```

#Creation of a variety of plots
##Exploration of density plots
###A simple plot
```{r}
ggplot(iris_data, aes(x=Petal.Width)) + geom_density()
```
